document.full_text: a report last year on cats' gravity-defying lapping mechanism surmised that dogs just crudely scoop up liquids. not so, researchers now say.
document.title: observatory: sloppiness aside, dogs are sophisticated drinkers too
lines_and_colors: a report last year on cats' gravity-defying lapping mechanism surmised that dogs just crudely scoop up liquids. not so, researchers now say.
